name: ADCHome
0:
”Alexa, open kitchen blinds to 50 percent”
”Alexa, set inclination of kitchen blinds to 50 percent”
”Alexa, close kitchen blinds”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The skill allows you to control your ADC controller connected devices.
To use this skill you will need at least 1 device that is connected to an ADC controller. The device must be set up using the ADC App on either Android or iOS and connected to your ADC account, prior to using the skill. More information about the app and ADC controller, including where and how to download and buy are available on the page https://adcsistemi.si .
After your devices have been added to your ADC account, you can enable this skill, perform a scan and all the devices on your ADC account will become available inside Alexa. You can then rename any of your devices within Alexa (this change is local to Alexa and will not be reflected to the ADC app) and begin controlling them with the listed example phrases. Further instructions, including a visual guide can be found on the above listed web page.
